name: Cubey vs. the Universe
description:
Cubey's just a little cube person, trying to make it in a big universe.



Cubey Vs. the Universe is a casual puzzle-runner game where you roll Cubey tile-by-tile from one end of the universe to the other. (Or as far as you can!)

Randomly generated blocking tiles will stop you unless you can deduce the way to match Cubey's sides to the obstacle. Don't take too long to think, or you'll be dropped into the cold vacuum of space.

Rack up a high score for distance, or for matches, or by collecting flags.
